AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cereal killer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME cant bear the sound of plants growing

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hat jaded
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to live in a colony that was very regarding about high rentability efficiency regarding prisonner and death casualities. NAME became allergic to rockman armchairs contact. Heaven became hell since it irritated its chitine.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Confused
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is confused about its racial identity? In the space, he met some people who made him understand HE was not human after all. It's life changing.
